titles.title: Hitozukiai ga Nigate na Miboujin no Yukionna-san to Noroi no Yubiwa
人付き合いが苦手な未亡人の雪女さんと呪いの指輪
The Shy Snow Woman and the Cursed Ring

title: Hitozukiai ga Nigate na Miboujin no Yukionna-san to Noroi no Yubiwa
title_english: The Shy Snow Woman and the Cursed Ring
title_japanese: 人付き合いが苦手な未亡人の雪女さんと呪いの指輪
synopsis:
In a world where many different species coexist, Takahashi inherits his father's youkai-exclusive apartment complex after he passes away. One day, Takahashi meets and instantly becomes attracted to a yuki-onna, or snow woman, named Yukino. Although they initially get along, an argument drives the two apart.

While pondering how to fix their situation, Takahashi finds a strange ring inside a mysterious box. The included description states that if one directs their desires at a youkai who is within view of the ring, it is possible to control their mind. Takahashi remains skeptical until, during another desperate attempt to talk to Yukino, he shows the ring to her and witnesses its potential. With immense power at his fingertips, Takahashi must decide whether to use the ring to restore his relationship with Yukino or to fulfill his primitive desires.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: Hitozukiai ga Nigate na Miboujin no Yukionna-san to Noroi no Yubiwa has been published in English as The Shy Snow Woman and the Cursed Ring by Irodori Comics.
